pageTitle: DSG INTL THAILAND PCL (DSGT:Bangkok): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {9759=DSG International (Thailand) Public Company Limited, Board Meeting, Feb 26, 2015. Agenda: To fix date, time, venue, agenda and other information of the 2015 annual general meeting of shareholders., 8269=DSG International (Thailand) Public Company Limited, Annual General Meeting, Apr 27, 2015., at 08:30 Indian Standard Time. Location: Crowne Ball Room, 21st floor, Crowne Plaza Bangkok Lumpini Park. Agenda: To adopt and approve the minutes of the annual general meeting of shareholders No. 1/2014 dated 24 April 2014; to acknowledge the report of the board of directors with respect to the company's performance for the fiscal year 2014; to consider and approve the audited financial statements of the company for the fiscal year 2014 which have been reviewed by the audit committee; to consider and approve the allocation of the net profit for legal reserve and the dividend payment of the year 2014 to the shareholders of the company; to consider and approve the appointment of the new directors as replacement for the retired directors who vacated office; to consider and approve the remuneration of the directors of the company for the fiscal year 2015; to consider and approve the appointment of the auditor of the company for the fiscal year 2015 and determination of the audit fee; and to approve other business (if any)., 7368=DSG International (Thailand) Public Company Limited announced consolidated and company earnings results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2015. For the year, on consolidated basis, net profit was THB 113.018 million or THB 0.09 per share compared to THB 241.003 million or THB 0.19 per share for the same period a year ago. For the year, on company only basis, the company announced net profit was THB 232.359 million or THB 0.18 per share compared to THB 229.709 million or THB 0.18 per share for the same period a year ago., 4822=DSG International (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, sells, and markets disposable baby diapers and adult incontinent products in Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, and Singapore. It offers disposable baby diapers under the Babylove, PetPet, and Fitti brands; and disposable adult diapers under the Certainty brand. DSG International (Thailand) Public Company Limited exports its products to customers in Central Asia, the Middle East, and Africa. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. DSG International (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of DSG International Limited.}
